summary:
Adds a Khajiit called Snit into your Breezehome.
(He\'s a bit short)
descriptionHtml:
Adds a Khajiit called Snit into your Breezehome. Just so you\'re not lonely wwhan you arrent married yet so you got someone to keep you company. Problems are if he sits down he glitches into the chair and grows when he uses the cooking pot. But I hope those little problems wont keep you away from your own little housecat. He can be used as storage (just pickpocket him).
He\'s got the voice of a dragon and is really how a dwarf should be.
Hope you enjoy!
author: madman12002
